steps.dialogue_text:
Villager: Please, help! Goblins have taken my daughter!
Villager: They dragged her toward the old cave to the east!
Villager: Please hurry!

Villager's Daughter: Thank you for saving me!
Villager's Daughter: My father will want to reward you.

Villager: You saved her! I cannot thank you enough!
Villager: Please, take this. It's a family heirloom.
Villager: You are always welcome in our home.
